column3: WBTT (105.5 The Beat) is a rhythmic contemporary radio station serving Southwest Florida -- primarily Lee
column5: and Charlotte counties. The Clear Channel Communications outlet broadcasts at 105.5 MHz with an ERP of 23.5 kW and its COL is Naples Park
column6: Florida. The station's current slogan is "SW Florida's #1 Party Station
column7: complemented by their on-air guarantee of 30 minutes of non-stop hip-hop."
